location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire to The Officer Commanding the Marine Battalion, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter reporting that Shaik Abdool Kareem [Shaikh 'Abd al-Karim], a private with the First Company Marine Battalion attached to the Escort at the Bombay Residency was proceeding to Bombay in confinement on board the HC Cruizer Elphinstone, and that a private from the Eighth Company on board the Elphinstonehad come on shore to replace him.
